alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 01 at 10:53PM CST until January 03 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON SUNDAY TO 3 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. For the second Wind Advisory, northwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph expected. * WHERE...In Alabama, Mobile Central, Baldwin Central, Mobile Coastal and Baldwin Coastal Counties. In Florida, Escambia Coastal, Santa Rosa Coastal and Okaloosa Coastal Counties. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until midnight CST tonight. For the second Wind Advisory, from noon Sunday to 3 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal
